paper_abstract: Phase structure of nonlinear dynamical system is governed by the vector field and decides the trajectories. Accordingly, the power spectra of trajectories include the structural field effect on the phase space. In this paper, we develop a method for analyzing phase structure using power spectra of trajectories and reconstitute a potential function in the system.
paper_title: Reconstitution of Potential Function by Power Spectra of Trajectories in Nonlinear Dynamical Systems
